label: Phone Services
description: Services related to phone calls, including call blocking, call forwarding, voicemail, and virtual numbers.

subcategories.label: Call Blocking
subcategories.description: Services that block unwanted calls and texts.

subcategories.label: Call Forwarding
subcategories.description: Services that forward calls to another number.

subcategories.label: Virtual Numbers
subcategories.description: Services that provide virtual phone numbers.
